name: Beyond the Neutral Zone
description:
Hello! Thank you for taking the time to look at my prototype game, Beyond the Neutral Zone. Currently, there are two gameplay modes, SkyMed and Battle, with up to five planned. Due to its prototype status, expect unimplemented and dangling features along with glaring omissions.

Done:

- Game Mode: SkyMed: Space Invaders meets Asteroids, without guns.

- Game Mode: Battle: SkyMed, with guns :-)

To-Do:

- Complete color selection dialogue (90% complete)

- Add more game modes

- Music

- Levels

- Suggest below!

Made with UPBGE 0.2.3
